0010110110001100 1001001100011110 0 -> sum: 1100000010101010, cout: 0
0111001000011100 0011000100001011 0 -> sum: 1010001100100111, cout: 0
1010111101100101 0000101100000010 1 -> sum: 1011101001101000, cout: 0
1100100101110010 0001110100001101 1 -> sum: 1110011010000000, cout: 0
0111110100100000 1100101111001100 1 -> sum: 0100100011101101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
